title: Support main's 1000th win coming up! Rito play with me?
body:
(moved from recruitment) Getting the chance to play with a staff member has been on my mind for a while now since I hit the 900's.  I'm super excited, and I was wondering if someone from the Riot staff would play with me for my (hopefully) 1000th win! I'm not too familiar with the staff's usernames, but I'm not picky--I'm just happy to have this chance!

I usually play in the late evenings EST. Pretty please?{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Are you free to play tomorrow around 6 PM PST?

I can jump in on this as well, but as a Support main myself, you should probably expect me to not do well on whatever other role I'm put on.

There's no time like the present to practice my Jungle Skillz.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KernelPanic,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wIIAVgdr,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-24T22:09:24.585+0000)
>
> I can jump in on this as well, but as a Support main myself, you should probably expect me to not do well on whatever other role I'm put on.
> 
> There's no time like the present to practice my Jungle Skillz.

I understand the feeling, haha. But either way, I would love to have you join in as well!

See what she did there ?????
-Free to Play-
-LoL is...-

Okay I'm out.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wIIAVgdr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-24T17:56:30.503+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Are you free to play tomorrow around 6 PM PST?

EEEEEEEEH So excited!!!! ^^ Thanks for the quick reply!

I'm unfortinately going to be at a birthday party at that time. I can probably be home and do it around 7 PM PST?

I'm usually home by 8 PST, is that feasible for you? :3

Add me on League, so I don't forget!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wIIAVgdr,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-02-25T03:18:40.484+0000)
>
> I'm usually home by 8 PST, is that feasible for you? :3
> 
> Add me on League, so I don't forget!

That sounds just fine! I'll add you right now. Lol it's hard not playing league and just waiting for this special game, hehe.

> [{quoted}](name=Silents429,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wIIAVgdr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-24T22:58:45.192+0000)
>
> Should record it if possible.

I wish I could, lol Unfortunately I have no equipment to do so. Definitely gonna screenshot the load page though as a souvenir!
That's just cool.  I don't know any other larger game that has devs who will do stuff like that.
Why people are so obsessed with playing 1000th match with a rioter?

> [{quoted}](name=Solaxo,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wIIAVgdr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-24T19:34:30.534+0000)
>
> Why people are so obsessed with playing 1000th match with a rioter?

It's become somewhat of a tradition I think. And it's just cool. Getting to play a game with the people who help make the game work. And if you've spent enough time to play approximately 2000 games (assuming 50/50 w/l ratio) it's a little Riot reward for hitting the mark.

How often do people get to sit down and play Zelda with Shigeru Miyamoto? *AND HOW AWESOME WOULD THAT BE?*
Why are people so obsessed with trolling threads?

Well why are YouTubers so obsessed about getting to 1 million subscribers? Why are League players obsessed about getting to Level 30? It's just a feel of accomplishment, that's all. But this would be your 1,000th win, so why not play that game with a Rioter to make it even more special. I'm just so happy to know that the staff here are fair and just wonderful people I'm general. Since my one year break (I was Level 5 and didn't even know this website existed) I've been playing for 3 weeks, and didn't know anything about the staff. So it's nice to know that the Riot employees are dedicated to keeping their players happy :)
It's just a kewl thing to do
